list.name: Resets
list.query: SELECT "string" FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("Reset" = '1' AND "key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter

target.query: SELECT "string" FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("Reset" = '1' AND "key" = 'Reset Reason') AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM /^$Sensor$/ WHERE ("key" = 'curl-time-connect' AND "value" = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rate") FROM (select "samples"/($Interval/1000) AS "rate" FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("node" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rate") FROM (select "samples"/("interval"/1000) AS "rate" FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("node" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "rate" FROM (select "samples"/($Interval/1000) AS "rate" FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("node" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter)
SELECT "rate" FROM (select "samples"/("interval"/1000) AS "rate" FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("node" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = node WHERE (_name =~ /^$Measurement$/)
list.name: Node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = node WHERE (_name =~ /^$Measurement$/)
